item.description: Last year, my book club meetup (South Shore Book Club Meetup Group) read Stieg Larsson's The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo. Now the book is a movie, with Daniel Craig as Blomkvist and Rooney Mara as Lisbeth Salander. North Darmouth Mall, according to the AMC website, sells tickets for $6.75 on Thursday nights. The movie starts at 7pm, so we will meet at 6:45 in the lobby. I am tall, with chin-length hair and thick glasses. I'll be wearing a black and white coat. We'll have Gretchen from the book club along as well; she is average height with curly red hair. Afterwards, we will go to TGI Friday's on Rt. 6 to discuss the movie. The movie is nearly 2 hours and 40 min long, so we probably won't get to TGIF until 10pm. Whether or not you read the book, come join us!

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Last minute movie: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
